name: MixedHistologyUrothelialCellCarcinomaForUrologyCare
title: Mixed histology urothelial cell carcinoma for Urology Care
description: (Clinical Focus: Mixed histology urothelial cell abnormalities for urology care),(Data Element Scope: This data element defines mixed urothelial cell histology, specifically micropapillary, plasmacytoid, sarcomatoid, adenocarcinoma, and squamous disease),(Inclusion Criteria: Mixed histology urothelial cell abnormalities as defined in the code list),(Exclusion Criteria: Other histological findings in the urinary bladder)
